content.raw:
I think it would be valuable to define what a `FreeGroup` is. Does it map directly to a single skeleton (ie. a connected group of links not connected to the world, with a FreeJoint in dart)? Or can there be multiple skeletons / unconnected free links? I think it will help clarify the meaning of `Model::FindFreeGroup` and `Link::FindFreeGroup` if we define `FreeGroup` better.

Initially, I assumed a `FreeGroup` had to be connected, such that a model with multiple skeletons would have multiple free groups. Of course, the way `Model::SetWorldPose` works in osrf/gazebo is that it acts on multiple connected groups of links, so it's helpful to create functions that support that use case. I think it could be clarified a bit.
